thread.section_title: WeddingWire Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WeddingWire | weddingwire.com
thread.title: Jonathan Cecilia

author: Jonathan Cecilia
title: Jonathan Cecilia
text: Weddingwire really helped us narrowing down our vendors with listings and reviews. Setting up our wedding website was easy. Guests enjoyed reading our story and viewing our pictures. I also took advantage of their seat planning & rsvp tool - again easy to use with customization flexibility. The only thing I'd suggest is that the print out is really pixalated so we had to do a screen capture instead. Would recommend weddingwire to future brides!
